head: how much can you allocate on the heap?
responses:
The default heap size is 1 MB. You cannot allocate more memory than you have available. For visual studio, you can set the size of the heap like in the first StackOverflow link below.

<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/28653477/self-limit-heap-size-in-c>

<https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/build/reference/heap-set-heap-size?view=msvc-160>

<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12411966/maximum-memory-for-stack-static-and-heap-memory-in-c>
